 2002-19532002-11-21,  ,  ,  ,  ND, 
ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisEnactment of the PROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 57 - which (a) DECLARES the severe flooding which occured in Alberta in June 2002, to be of concern to the federal government, and (b) AUTHORIZES the provision of financial assistance in that regard.
